author: Special Correspondent
title: Tribals told to stay at home
description: The Hassan district administration has told people belonging to the nomadic tribal communities, who have a history of visiting neighbouring States and districts, to stay at home. The officers have war
content:
The Hassan district administration has told people belonging to the nomadic tribal communities, who have a history of visiting neighbouring States and districts, to stay at home. The officers have warned them of action if they violate the instruction.
A team… [+1605 chars]
